hero.title: Book a Consultation
hero.subtitle: Schedule a meeting with our team to discuss your project

introduction.title: Start Your Project
introduction.content: Ready to transform your property with quality masonry and construction work? Book a consultation with our team to discuss your project needs, timeline, and budget. We'll provide expert guidance and a detailed quote to help bring your vision to life.

steps.title: Submit Request
steps.description: Fill out the booking form with your project details and preferred consultation time.

steps.title: Confirmation
steps.description: Receive confirmation of your booking request within 24 hours.

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: Meet with our experts to discuss your project needs and vision.

steps.title: Detailed Proposal
steps.description: Receive a comprehensive proposal with pricing and timeline.

formSettings.title: Booking Request Form
formSettings.subtitle: Please provide the following information to schedule your consultation
formSettings.successMessage: Thank you for your booking request! We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your consultation.

fields.label: Project Description
fields.placeholder: Please describe your project in detail

fields.label: How did you hear about us?

testimonial.name: Robert & Karen Thompson
testimonial.text: The consultation process with Fouquette Contracting was incredibly helpful. They listened to our ideas, provided expert advice, and delivered a detailed proposal that matched our vision and budget perfectly.

questions.question: Is there a fee for the consultation?
questions.answer: No, our initial consultations are complimentary. We provide a free, no-obligation consultation to discuss your project needs and provide guidance.

questions.question: How long does a typical consultation last?
questions.answer: Most consultations take approximately 60-90 minutes, depending on the complexity of your project and the number of questions you have.

questions.question: Should I prepare anything for the consultation?
questions.answer: If available, it's helpful to have any relevant plans, photos of inspiration, or a list of questions/priorities for your project. However, this isn't requiredâ€”we're happy to start from scratch.

questions.question: How soon can I schedule a consultation?
questions.answer: Typically, we can schedule consultations within 1-2 weeks, depending on the current season and demand. We'll work to accommodate your preferred date and time.

seo.title: Book a Consultation | Fouquette Contracting | Minnesota Masonry & Construction
seo.description: Schedule a free consultation with Fouquette Contracting for your masonry or construction project in Minnesota. Get expert advice and a detailed quote for your vision.
seo.keywords: book consultation, masonry quote, construction estimate, project planning, Minnesota contractor, free consultation, construction consultation
